snippet.title: Darkest Dungeon - The Crimson Court - Launch Trailer [OFFICIAL]
snippet.description:
Darkest Dungeon®: The Crimson Court is the first expansion for the award-winning grim and gothic RPG by Red Hook Studios. The Crimson Court enhances any Darkest Dungeon campaign with the addition of a new storyline and dungeon, new hero class, new monsters, new bosses, the Fanatic wandering miniboss, set trinkets for every hero, and new buildings to upgrade your Hamlet! It is designed to be played alongside your existing campaign or as a new one...it’s your choice!

STEAM: http://store.steampowered.com/app/580100/Darkest_Dungeon_The_Crimson_Court/
GoG: https://www.gog.com/game/darkest_dungeon

www.darkestdungeon.com
